WTOBJECT.name: Member
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: If IsTraining(oMember) And IsCompliance(oMember) Then reqCertified = 1 reqCode = 3 Else reqCode = 1 End If

WTACTION.name: Grade
WTACTION.WTCUSTOM: If reqAnswer1 <> 1 Then reqAnswer1 = -1 If reqAnswer2 <> 2 Then reqAnswer2 = -1 If reqAnswer3 <> 3 Then reqAnswer3 = -1 If reqAnswer4 <> 4 Then reqAnswer4 = -1 If reqAnswer5 <> 1 Then reqAnswer5 = -1 If reqAnswer1 <> -1 And reqAnswer2 <> -1 And reqAnswer3 <> -1 And reqAnswer4 <> -1 And reqAnswer5 <> -1 Then reqPass = 1

WTACTION.name: Grade
WTACTION.WTCUSTOM: If reqAnswer1 <> 1 Then reqAnswer1 = -1 If reqAnswer2 <> 2 Then reqAnswer2 = -1 If reqAnswer3 <> 3 Then reqAnswer3 = -1 If reqAnswer4 <> 4 Then reqAnswer4 = -1 If reqAnswer5 <> 1 Then reqAnswer5 = -1 If reqAnswer1 <> -1 And reqAnswer2 <> -1 And reqAnswer3 <> -1 And reqAnswer4 <> -1 And reqAnswer5 <> -1 Then reqPass = 1

WTACTION.name: New
WTACTION.WTCUSTOM: Set oData = server.CreateObject("MSXML2.FreeThreadedDOMDocument") oData.loadXML xmlSummary Set oIC = oData.selectNodes("/PTSSUMMARY") For Each oItem In oData.selectNodes("/PTSSUMMARY") oItem.setAttribute("pb") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("pb"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("pc") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("pc"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("pd") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("pd"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("bv") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("bv"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("cb") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("cb"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("ct") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("ct"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("c1") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("c1"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("c2") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("c2"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("c3") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("c3"), 2) oItem.setAttribute("c4") = FormatCurrency(oItem.getAttribute("c4"), 2) Next xmlSummary = oData.XML Set oData = Nothing
